settings.overlay_text: If you’re already experiencing the benefits that premium-quality CBD-infused treats can bring to your 4-legged companion - now it’s time to join the growing band of fans who are using CBD products to enhance their personal lifestyle.

settings.overlay_title: Welcome to Our Preferred Range of Organic CBD Products to Support Your Well-being
settings.overlay_text: If you’re already experiencing the benefits that premium-quality CBD-infused treats can bring to your 4-legged companion - now it’s time to join the growing band of fans who are using CBD products to enhance their personal lifestyle.

settings.text:
There’s no doubt about it - we live in stressful times! More and more people are turning to CBD products to reduce symptoms of anxiety, including insomnia, dizziness, heart palpitations, restlessness, overthinking, and shortness of breath. 

Why has CBD become so popular? Users typically report that when taken regularly, it can help to reduce these unwanted symptoms and make it easier to cope with the stresses of everyday life.

settings.title: The solution couldn’t be easier - or more enjoyable!
settings.text:
We’ve partnered with our friends at Green Compass Global to bring you a whole range of ways to use their clean, organic CBD.

With premium oils and tinctures, creams and topicals, bath and skincare products, and of course,  a couple of our favorites: their irresistible yummy gummies and effective tincture to choose from, you’ll find products you love and give the benefits you deserve!

settings.title: WELCOME TO YOUR ONE-STOP-SHOP FOR ALL THINGS RELATED TO PSYCHIATRIC SERVICE DOGS (PSDS)
settings.text:
Let’s Cover Some of the Basics.

What is a Therapist Certified Letter and why do you need one?

A Therapist Certified Letter is a document that verifies your need for a Psychiatric Support Dog. It's required by law in order to fly with your PSD or live in housing that prohibits dogs. Without this letter, you risk being denied access to these benefits and even face legal consequences.

settings.title: Protecting Your Wellness - A Number One Priority
settings.text:
A happy life starts with your health. We love Green Compass organic CBD because this fabulous range includes products our customers adore! Dozens of testimonials suggest that organic hemp flower extract:

  • Organic hemp flower extract reduces anxiety and promotes a sense of calm
  • Fortified with glucosamine to help increase a desire to be active and promote overall  wellness
  • Supports a healthy inflammatory response  
  • Enhances bone and joint health 
  • Supports healthy cartilage 
  • Helps stay healthy and move without pain 
  • Safe for all ages and sizes

settings.title: We All Need a Helping Hand Sometimes
settings.text:
If you have a certified support animal or service dog, you’ll know how incredibly susceptible they are to our moods. When you’re stressed and anxious, they feel it. That’s why, using a safe, natural solution such as organic CBD won’t just make life easier and more pleasant for you, it could help your four-legged friend chill and enjoy life, too.

  • Feel balanced and calm whether at home or when you’re on the move
  • Deal more easily with environments you typically find challenging
  • Face activities that may cause anxiety - social events, sports etc.with confidence 
  • Handle any separation from your support animal more easily - until you’re happily reunited!

Taking just the right amount of calming CBD, in whatever form you like best can be just what you both need to stay relaxed, so you can move through life easily and get the most from each day you spend together.

settings.title: The Purest Hemp Seeds
settings.text: Green Compass hemp seeds are organic and non-GMO, with elevated levels of beneficial CBD and over 100 other helpful plant compounds to support your physical and emotional wellness.

settings.title: USD Certified Organic
settings.text:
Green Compass hemp is grown on their own USDA-certified organic soil. The crops are rotated every 3 years to rest the land, ensuring their products are as nutrient-dense and clean as Felicitails customers deserve.

We love that they care for our environment as well as our pets

settings.title: Exacting Production Standards
settings.text:
We love Green Compass CBD products because the company is laser-focused on delivering the highest-quality end product.

It starts with their commitment to organic hemp farming practices through extraction, formulation, and bottling. And continues with their outstanding customer service and satisfaction guarantees.

settings.title: It’s in Your Hands
settings.text:
Green Compass production methods may take a bit more time –but the result is a luxury range that you can trust.

Each product is packed with premium CBD and additional phytonutrients to support your mood and overall well-being.

settings.title: Instant Calmer!
settings.text:
Green Compass offers a convenient subscription service to make life even easier - you’ll never need to worry about running out of your favorite CBD product from them!  In addition, it’s totally flexible, so you can pause or cancel any time.

You’ll enjoy the peace of mind that comes from knowing that when life gets challenging, you’re ready to protect your well-being with Green Compass organic CBD-enriched products.

settings.testimonial:
Full moon 🌕 and Monday... 😅🙏🏼

The kids are already off the rails.. but. We got this. 🌱 

It’s crazy to think just 6 months ago I was living in a world where my mental health was not okay. I wasn’t me. I felt checked out. But I was hiding it. Denying it. Embarrassed to be going thru something like postpartum depression, anxiety, rage... for the first time. Confused. Angry. 

Why me? Why NOW??? 

CBD was the farthest thing from my mind, but I knew I had to do something. Because my family is my everything. They deserve the best version of me.

I deserve the best version of me. 🖤 Thankful I gave this a shot. Blessed to have people in my life who brought this journey to our family.
settings.author: Kayla Gorman

settings.testimonial:
That’s me on the right there. With a partially paralyzed left leg and drop foot. As hard as life would throw stuff at me, I found a way and won Miss Southeast Texas with a cast and a limp.

All it took was saying WHY NOT....to CBD.

I was born with several ailments linked to my dad’s exposure to Agent Orange while fighting in the Vietnam war. (Its a Neurotoxin that attaches to the DNA and is passed down.) I was born with a leg decrepancy where my legs would no grow at the same rate, and this caused a domino effect of issues from hip and knee problems, to neurological issues that would get worse as time went on.  On top of that I suffered massively with focus, stress, sleep, hormonal and gastrointestinal issues. Not o mention the most PAINFUL cycles that would put me down for 2 days a month.... much more, but I don’t want to get too specific. It still makes me cry remembering where I used to be.
settings.author: Marlies Fitch Ledbetter

settings.testimonial:
I really don't have to words to express how thankful I am for how different my life looks today vs a year and a half ago.

Today I wake up and my arms aren't numb from working behind the chair for over 20 years!

Today I wake up and I don't have knots in my back and a crick in my neck from sitting tense every second of my day.

Today I don't have my own personal summers several times a day.

Most of all, Today I wake up and remember what I walked into a room for!!!

You may laugh and think I'm being funny (I mean, why wouldn't you 😉), BUT let me explain exactly what that means to me.
settings.author: Derevaun Pham

settings.testimonial:
My daughter is my why and inspiration everyday to keep sharing hope in hemp!

I want to share a personal story with all of you.  My daughter was diagnosed years ago with ADHD and her Doctor prescribed her focalin.  Of course at the time we were apprehensive but didn't know of any other option and agreed to proceed. The cost of her medication was through the roof and we were spending close to $200/ month.  That was a huge investment for us but of course we did it because as parents we will do whatever we can to help our children.  Unfortunately there were too many side effects so we approached the Doctor about other options.  At that time, the Doctor told us if we take her off focalin, this could cause her to have some withdrawals such as irritability and anxiety.  He then suggested an SSRI to combat any anxiety.  So of course at that time, we didn't know any better and said okay.
settings.author: Sara Dotchin Andersen

settings.testimonial:
Okay, testimonial time because I’m sooo amazed by these products! I’ve tried other CBD brands & NONE of them compare.

The CBD Nano-Jellies are my absolute favorite, but I also favor the Cinnamon & Fresh Mint CBD oil. 

Overall my mood & focus has changed Dramatically. I no longer experience daytime exhaustion or brain fog. I have tons of energy, & I able to focus & stay on task better. 

I have a sense of ease that I’ve NEVER experienced before.

Let’s talk about sleep 😴 I used to wake up 2-3 times a night, & sometimes not be able to go back to sleep. That has completely changed! I actually sleep through the night now!! 

And to have control of my menstrual cramps, after dealing with 5 years of agonizing pain, due to an Ectopic Pregnancy that burst my Fallopian Tube. That is a true BLESSING that I can’t describe!! 🌱💚🌱
settings.author: Erin Herbert

settings.testimonial: When my son was 19 months old we noticed he had many sensory issues that were interfering with his everyday life.  He had a speech delay and some speech regression. We started him in Early Intervention and OT twice a week and began to see some improvmemts.  When he was 2.5 yrs old we noticed he was having a lot of anxiety, thus we started seeing a Developmental Pediatrician in Boston.  His anxiety manifested through daily stomach aches, difficulties falling asleep and waking through the night, severe separation anxiety and decreased communication skills.  He started in preschool with full services, PT, OT, and speech.  He did well in school academically but wasn't speaking or making any friends.  He kept to himself and did not participate in any movement activities.  At home he was having significant meltdowns and had minimal coping skills.
settings.author: Lindsay Tucker

settings.que: CBD: What is the difference between CBD and Marijuana?
settings.ans: There are two main sources for CBD found in nature. The hemp plant and the marijuana plant.  Green Compass products are derived from hemp only and extracted from the same hemp flower harvested on our Green Compass Farms. Our hemp has been engineered to be high in CBD, while containing only trace amounts of THC.

settings.que: What is the best way to store your products?
settings.ans:
Make sure to keep the lid secure and store it in a cool, dry place away from light.

An example of this would be inside a cabinet.

That is certainly our goal! All of our products are made from plants; however, not all of them are vegan certified yet. While most of our products are vegan certified, our skincare line, Reduce line, Soothe Cream, and Jellies are not, though we are currently working on a certification for the topical products!

Our creams are not certified hypoallergenic, but we do use only natural ingredients! You can access a full ingredient list for the topical creams on the website, which you can refer to if there is a specific ingredient you are looking for. If you have sensitive skin or are concerned about your body's reaction to the cream, we would recommend trying a little bit of the cream on your forearm first to be sure you do not experience any negative symptoms. 

We always recommend consulting with your physician if you have any concerns before using a product.

Green Compass products that are USDA Organic will feature the logo. While not all our products are officially USDA Organic certified, the ones that are still pending will feature the same organic ingredients that consumers have begun to rely on from Green Compass. Our products are also certified Gluten Free, Kosher, Vegan, Eco-Friendly, Lab-Tested, and Made in the USA!

Classic CBD oil tinctures are absorbed (sublingually) at a rate of 10-15%, due to the large particle size of the oil droplets. 

When we nanotize our oil we reduce the particle size which allows for a higher absorption rate by the body, by up to 90%!  

The 5mg Nano Jellies will have a 5-10x higher bio availability than other gummies on the market, because others are not water-soluble and will break down with minimal to no absorption. The Nano Jellies are the first ever USDA organic, water-soluble, broad spectrum jelly on the market! 

Essentially, we are looking at a product that can make a big impact, in a smaller size.
